bibl.title: From One to One Million: The Meroitic Numbers on an Ostracon from Qasr Ibrim (REM 2112).
bibl.note: This ostracon was found in 1980. In spite of its incompleteness, the ostracon presents a unique overview of the Meroitic numeral system and clear evidence for the way in which the numerals were constructed.
